Reviews.Author: Ven
Reviews.Content: This phone is pretty cool small and handy but be aware that it is not an 8520 but in fact the real product is a cdma 8530. Bought it and fell in love with it until i tried to insert a sim card. i just wasted my money thinking i was buyin an 8520.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: It was brand new and exactly what I wanted from the colour to the quality.

Reviews.Title: Excelente la compra
Reviews.Author: Monica
Reviews.Content: Primera compra que hago por este medio, me pareció seria y responsable... lo recomiendo!.. es por esto que le doy la mayor calificación...

ProductInfo.Name: BlackBerry Curve 8520 Violet WiFi Unlocked GSM QuadBand Bar Cell Phone
